metadata.name: Eli
metadata.description: There is an island in the south of my motherland  Persia called Hengam, most of the women that  living on this island wear this type of traditional clothing. This beautiful and dignified lady is called Eli. She lives on this island and she lost her husband in the war and she is  mother of two daughters and her  only way to earn money   is  weaving  handicrafts that was very interesting to me and  despite all these  difficulties  she was very hopeful about the future and she told me  for the happiness of my daughters I should work hard to give them a bright future. You can see the beauty , dignity and resistance in her face.
